Package org.tms.api.events Description

The TMS event subsystem. TableElements that implement the Listenable interface can register to be notified when TableElements are created, deleted, or modified, before or after the triggering action occurs, and when Derivable derivations are recalculated.
Since:
"1.0"
Version:
"1.1"
